T02D2220:60b-1: aa dva la siddhi s'a dha na n'a ma //
T02D2220:60b-3: gnyis su med par grub pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2220:60b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2220:60b-5: mgon po'i rang bzhin gsal ba ni //
T02D2220:60b-6: khams gsum las byung thams cad mkhyen //
T02D2220:61a-3: yul dus chos dang gza' skar dang //
T02D2220:61a-4: dkyil 'khor brtag pa mi dgos pa'i //
T02D2220:61a-5: rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub thabs bshad //
T02D2220:61a-6: bsdus te bsgrub pa sgrub pa'i mchog / dam bca' dka' thub smyung ba dang //
T02D2220:61a-7: snying po sgom pa smra ba la //
T02D2220:61a-8: 'di nyid med par gyur na ni //
T02D2220:61a-10: che chung sa bon la sogs tshogs //
T02D2220:61a-11: sna yi nang nas 'byung ba dang //
T02D2220:61a-12: sngags pa rtag tu mchod pa byed //
T02D2220:61a-13: bdag nyid de nyid bsgom ste mchod //
T02D2220:61a-14: ma dang srid mo bu mo dang //
T02D2220:61a-15: de bzhin tsha mo nyid dang ni //
T02D2220:61a-16: shes rab thabs su bya ba ste //
T02D2220:61a-17: rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu mchod //
T02D2220:61a-18: yan lag gcig med rigs ngan dang //
T02D2220:61a-19: bzo bo khyi sha can sogs kyi //
T02D2220:61a-20: bu mo rtag tu mchod par bya //
T02D2220:61a-21: ye shes rdo rje bsgom pa che //
T02D2220:61a-22: de kho na nyid kyi sngags kyi 'bras bu ni 'di yin no //
T02D2220:61a-25: drag po'i las kyis sems can rnams //
T02D2220:61a-26: thabs kyis 'khor ba dag las grol //
T02D2220:61a-27: dam tshig nyin mtshan rtag tu ni //
T02D2220:61a-28: rigs lnga las byung bzang po dang //
T02D2220:61a-29: gsal ba'i tshogs kyi mchod pa byed ;
T02D2220:61a-31: sngags pa rab dga'i mig gis ni //
T02D2220:61a-32: rtag tu mig gi mdangs phyung ste //
T02D2220:61a-33: yang dag sems ni brtan po yis //
T02D2220:61a-34: ye shes rgya mtsho skam par byed //
T02D2220:61a-35: ji ltar g-yo dang mi g-yo ba //
T02D2220:61a-36: khams gsum thams cad ma lus pa //
T02D2220:61a-37: thams cad de nyid rnam 'byor ni //
T02D2220:61a-38: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du mthong //
T02D2220:61a-39: gzhan du kha cig smra ba dang //
T02D2220:61a-40: mtshan ma'i bye brag 'dug pa la //
T02D2220:61a-41: de la brnyas par mi bya ste //
T02D2220:61a-42: rdo rje sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul nyid //
T02D2220:61a-43: thams cad mnyam pa nyid gnas te //
T02D2220:61a-44: ma lus dngos po med pa ni //
T02D2220:61a-45: sngags pas rtag tu sgom par byed //
T02D2220:61a-46: phung po'i rang bzhin dag pa nyid //
T02D2220:61a-47: dri dang gos dang me tog sogs //
T02D2220:61a-48: sbos dang lha bshos de bzhin du //
T02D2220:61a-49: glu dang rol mo gar sogs kyis //
T02D2220:61a-50: thabs kyi bdag po dga' bar 'gro //
T02D2220:61a-51: dka' thub ngan pas gzir mi bya //
T02D2220:61b-0: smyung ba yi @61b ni las mi bya //
T02D2220:61b-1: khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste //
T02D2220:61b-2: blo gros chung ngu'i spyod mi bya //
T02D2220:61b-3: lugs ma la sogs phyag mi bya //
T02D2220:61b-4: sa shing rdo sogs de bzhin no //
T02D2220:61b-5: bdag gi lus la rgyun du mchod //
T02D2220:61b-6: rtag tu sems gcig kho nas mchod //
T02D2220:61b-7: sbrang bu skyugs pa bsres pa yis//
T02D2220:61b-8: che chung tshogs kyis sbyang bar bya //
T02D2220:61b-9: gsal ba lnga dang ldan par byed //
T02D2220:61b-10: rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod par bya //
T02D2220:61b-11: bud med rang byung me tog ni //
T02D2220:61b-12: byang chub sems dang ldan par bya //
T02D2220:61b-13: rtag tu lha mo mchod par bya //
T02D2220:61b-14: phung po de nyid bsgom par bya //
T02D2220:61b-15: gzhan gyi nor dag 'phrog par bya //
T02D2220:61b-16: gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya //
T02D2220:61b-17: brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya //
T02D2220:61b-18: sangs rgyas thams cad gsang bar bya //
T02D2220:61b-19: rdo sogs mchod rten mi bya ste //
T02D2220:61b-20: glegs bam dag kyang bklag mi bya //
T02D2220:61b-21: rmi lam tsam du dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2220:61b-22: lus kyis bya bar mi bya'o //
T02D2220:61b-23: thams cad dag ni kun la yang //
T02D2220:61b-24: rtog pa dag ni mi bya ste //
T02D2220:61b-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du //
T02D2220:61b-26: dngos po ma lus gyur par bsam //
T02D2220:61b-28: de bzhin za dang mi za dang //
T02D2220:61b-30: sems ni rtog par mi bya'o //
T02D2220:61b-31: rnam par snang mdzad byung ba la ;
T02D2220:61b-32: / sems can thams cad yan lag tu //
T02D2220:61b-33: mkhas pas sems can kun blangs te //
T02D2220:61b-34: dngos grub rgyur ni bza' bar bya //
T02D2220:61b-35: thams cad rigs nas byung ba yi //
T02D2220:61b-36: bud med dag la brtag mi bya //
T02D2220:61b-37: de nyid bcom ldan pha rol phyin //
T02D2220:61b-38: kun rdzob tsam gyi gzugs nyid do //
T02D2220:61b-39: tshes grangs skar ma mi dgos te //
T02D2220:61b-40: smyung bar yang ni gnas mi bya //
T02D2220:61b-41: gnyis med ye shes ldan pa yis //
T02D2220:61b-42: bde bar gshegs pa'i dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D2220:61b-43: mang po smras te ci zhig bya //
T02D2220:61b-44: ji lta ji ltar mthong ba dag / de dag thams cad rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2220:61b-45: mthong zhing rig pas shes par bya //
T02D2220:61b-46: ba long rta bong rnga mo dang //
T02D2220:61b-47: ba dang khyi las byung ba las //
T02D2220:61b-48: gsal bar che ba bsres byas te //
T02D2220:61b-49: rnal 'byor mkhyen pas rtag tu bza' //
T02D2220:61b-50: gcig la chags par mi bya ste //
T02D2220:61b-51: gang yang blang dor mi bya'o //
T02D2220:61b-52: rnal 'byor mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D2220:62a-3: kun gyis mang po spros pa dang //
T02D2220:62a-4: de dag med na 'khor ba med //
T02D2220:62a-5: skye ba dang ni 'byung ba med //
T02D2220:62a-6: bcom ldan rdo rje nyi mas ni //
T02D2220:62a-7: shes rab mtshan mos bshad pa ste //
T02D2220:62a-8: de 'dra'i rnal 'byor sgo me byed na ;
T02D2220:62a-9: / myur du dngos grub thob par byed //
T02D2220:62a-10: thams cad sems kyis chos nyid ni //
T02D2220:62a-11: dngos por ma grub brtag dka' ba //
T02D2220:62a-12: de nyid slob dpon zhal nas ni //
T02D2220:62a-13: thob par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02D2220:62a-14: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yin //
T02D2220:62a-15: mtshan ma med pa gnas ni med //
T02D2220:62a-16: de shes byang chub mchog tu 'gro //
T02D2220:62a-17: de ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor ni //
T02D2220:62a-18: blo can rtag tu bslab par bya //
T02D2220:62a-19: de nyid 'grub par the tshom med //
T02D2220:62a-21: khams gsum na ni slob dpon las //
T02D2220:62a-22: che bar gyur pa gzhan med na //
T02D2220:62a-23: de nyid kyi ni bka' drin gyis //
T02D2220:62a-24: dngos grub mang po thob par 'gyur //
T02D2220:62a-25: de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
T02D2220:62a-26: sangs rgyas thams cad phyag kyang 'tshal //
T02D2220:62a-27: slob dpon mchod pa bla na med //
T02D2220:62a-28: ci tsam nus par mchod par bya //
T02D2220:62a-29: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid //
T02D2220:62a-30: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir ;
T02D2220:62a-31: / gzugs su snang ba kun rdzob ste //
T02D2220:62a-32: rnal 'byor bdag nyid gdan la 'dug /'chi bdag de ni rtag pa che //
T02D2220:62a-33: thams cad ma lus stong pa nyid //
T02D2220:62a-34: rang gi rtog pa mi snang la //
T02D2220:62a-35: gzhan dag de la dga' bar byed //
T02D2220:62a-36: gnyis su med par grub pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya
T02D2220:62a-37: ba 'di ni au rgyan gyi che ba rnal 'byor
T02D2220:62a-38: gdan gyis sgrub pa'i lha'i gnas nas phyung ba /
